answers.answer: Sounds like your.plug and bloody show. I'd call labor and delivery being short of breath and dizzy could be your bloodpressure.
Are you dehydrated? That can cause headaches
Sounds like preeclampsia.. call your doctor

Dehydration came to mind.  If it was preeclampsia wouldn't my Dr see protein in my urine... I don't have any sudden swelling either ? High blood pressure is possible because my heart pounds when I get up that's when I become dizzy.
call in b/c those symptomsoverlap withsome dangerous possibilities..though. itcouldjust be your body getting ready

question: I'm 36 weeks.  I'm experiencing a major headache, dizziness, shortness of breath,  Idk whether hot flashes or a fever  but I woke up out a nap soaking wet.  It's been happening so much lately.  And I've lost a chunk of my mucus plug, it had little specs of brown blood in it.  At the moment no contractions,  just cramping.Should I be worried???
title: advice needed!!
